content:
Like many of you around the world, COVID changed me too! I was running a traditional marketing agency during that time. Businesses were transforming themselves, fish sellers started selling through WhatsApp and so many Shopify stores opened up! Everybody was trying to survive with whatever means they had. 

Our clients wanted to go intense on social media but economic pressure made their budget super tight. So they were constantly requesting us to reduce the cost but we couldn't do it since the agency was manual intensive.

This took us to a new problem statement. Can we automatically create brand-relevant marketing content without manual effort? This problem statement pushed us through the rabbit hole of tech, design and Generative AI.

The idea is to create an agency-like experience in an app. Just enter a keyword and it the app generates poster options in one click. These posters perfectly aligned to your brand language, saved during the login. Accept the poster or generate new ones! 

This app can save a ton of time and costs for small business owners, e-commerce stores, agency owners and marketers. Give it a try (it's fun) and let us know your thoughts :)
Wow, it's like a Canva but takes less effort to make up some design. Will ever be available version for iOS?

Some magic is happening here! I remember the times I spent like 2-3 hours finalising posters, trying to match colours, fonts and all at once. And of course limited by the time frames. It was such a struggle.

Now I know where to go next time I have a struggle with preparing posters in the last moment! :)

Great job guys, looks fascinating. Congratulations on the launch!
Nice product guys! Can totally see how this is useful for marketers. Well done and best of luck with it! :-)
wow looking great! I like the editor part - it is more convenient to edit yourself than try 100 times with AI until it will meet your inquiry!

Wizad is like great product for creating social media posters effortlessly, saving time and cost for businesses. Excited to see this innovative solution in action! Congratulations team! Hope for the best
This seems to be good, but how is this better or different than creating posters on Canva itself?

A an idea guy who is always on the hunt for on-the-go tools, I think this is really brilliant. I mean I can't keep a track of times I have struggled coming up with ideas about content and design for social media. Not to mention the cost factor. I am definitely look forward to trying Wizard out!

Congrats on the launch!
Congrats for your launch Sanid! Pretty interesting product, I trust many small & medium scale marketing teams would find this super useful for their campaigns.
Wow, This can be used for blogs too. Amazing!!
congrats on the launch! AI is boosting the content marketing area and Wizad will be the game changer after canva, kitt, fotor, and photoroom!
Creating content with AI is pretty easy. Making it on brand and maintain an appropriate voice is much more challenging. I'm really excited to try this out!
Looks promising. Good job guys!

The go-to option to make designs without professional help today is Canva, 

But posters made out of Canva are often generic and don't help the business stand out. 

Wizad helps solve this problem! 

The app generates brand-aligned social media posters in just a click with generative AI. 

Input brand style and logo when you log in. Enter a keyword for which you want to create the poster and the app does the rest!
Canva alternative for poster designs, amazing tool. Looking to check it out.
Excellent product that preserves the brand identity, story and character while taking the AI transformation journey!

Just tried the app out ,it looks promising may need some rework especially on adding an edit option.The wait time seems a bit too much but its still better than taking days just to get one design.Here i got like 4-5 designs in under 5 minutes.Rooting for your success.

I love that this is like a Canva but much better. With more and more AI images coming out lately, any way to make images look less AI-generated? Maybe by uploading some brand inspo images and then basing poster designs mostly on those?

Although we have AI tools like Dall-e and Midjourney for image generation, 

A small business owner still needs a professional‚Äôs help to create posters.

Dall E and Midjourney requirs at least 20 minutes of back-and-forth prompting. Then there is a  Photoshop effort to customise and edit it according to the brand‚Äôs tone of voice. 

The other option is Canva, which just gives you generic posters. 

Our app Wizad.ai creates brand-aligned social media posters in just a click! 
It‚Äôs as easy as entering a keyword and getting images. This saves a lot of time for business owners and marketers.

It looks interesting Product!! 

Congratulations on the launch!!

For me, this product presents such an awesome platform for creators and digital marketers to prosper in their ecosystem, especially doing so with the power of AI-integrated poster maker. 
Congratulations to the team, Happy launch.
Cool app if you like making things on your mobile device. Wish you all the best with your launch!
Congrats with today's launch guys!

Create stunning social media designs effortlessly with impeccably aligned Designs, exellent font pairing and curated color palettes that harmonize with your brand. Elevate your content creation journey with precision and style, all with one click.

Wizad is the perfect app for easily creating eye-catching social media posters that seamlessly align with your brand's identity. Congratulations on the launch!

The key strength of Wizad lies in its promise of effortless poster creation. The platform's user-friendly interface and customizable templates empower users to craft eye-catching visuals without the steep learning curve typically associated with graphic design software.
This will save people so much money and time üî•
Wizad has truly revolutionized my social media game. With its one-click solution for creating stunning posters, I've saved countless hours while still producing top-notch content.

First of all, let's extend our warm congratulations to the Wizad team and express our gratitude for bringing us such an amazing product. After using it myself, I found that Wizad is an ideal application for effortlessly creating stunning social media posters, allowing us to bid farewell to the hassle of hiring designers and spending hours tweaking templates. I think the product is excellent, and I wish you all the best!
